Your Return Request Confirmation
Hello,
We are so sorry that you have to return your YETI product. We know how disappointing it can be to receive items and have them not work out for you, so we are going to do our best to make this process quick and easy. This email highlights and explains the return process in order to give you a better understanding of how we do things!
Your Return Information:
Return Order #: Items returned: ***
To return your YETI product please follow the steps below:
A separate email will be sent to you with a return packing slip. Please print the return packing slip and include it with your package. (Please place it inside the cooler or along with the items you are returning.)
When possible, we kindly ask that you protect your product during shipping by boxing and use either FEDEX or UPS when returning your cooler.
Our shipping address is:
YETI
Attention: RETURNS
951 Valley View Lane
Irving, TX 75061
** Please ask for a copy of your receipt confirming your drop off at FedEx and keep this for your records. **
Once your return has been received at YETI Coolers, you will receive an email confirmation that your return is being processed. Please be aware this process takes 5-7 business days.
Thanks for being a YETI customer! Please let us know if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
{!User.CommunityNickname} Account Management Team YETI 512.394.0222 sales@yeti.com yeti.com
